title: "Nanoscale light element identification using machine learning aided STEM-EDS"
excerpt: "In this study, we achieved light element identification with nanoscale spatial resolution in a multi-component metal alloy through unsupervised machine learning algorithms of singular value decomposition (SVD) and independent component analysis (ICA)."
